title: Nick's 40th Birthday Surprise! -KFAF
description:
Hurry to http://upstart.com/morning to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

Get 20% off and free shipping by using the code MORNING at http://manscaped.com.

Get two pounds of salmon absolutely free, plus $20 off your first box by going to http://butcherbox.com/morning or use promo code MORNING at checkout.

 The KF crew all got Nick presents including a special message from a surprise super celebrity!  

Time Stamps - 
00:00:15 - We Celebrate Nick’s 40th Birthday
00:20:03 - Upstart
00:21:26 - Manscaped
00:23:08 - ButcherBox
00:25:00 - Sink my WarBoat
00:29:05 - Photoshop Challenge: Famous historical photos/paintings (Colin Davis)
00:37:28 - Next Week’s Photoshop Challenge: 2020 movie posters! (Michael aka EatMaBalls)
00:37:55 - Ask Andy Anything

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
